name: Lucky Charm VS Zombies - Zombies free game
name_original: Lucky Charm VS Zombies - Zombies free game
description:
A large wave of zombies have come.They disturb the quiet of village.So the taoist priest gives lucky charm to the villagers.These lucky charm can destroy the zombies.Let's come and help the villagers,and destroy all of the zombies.

The aim of this game is to let the lucky charm hit the zombies and destroy them.
